item.description:
12-3pm $40 Qi gong for Weight Loss

Pi Gu technique is a type of Qi Gong that is used to shrink the stomach. Excess weight is commonly caused from a blockage in the middle warmer or middle Dantien. Opening the energy will prevent hunger and retrain the mind to lose weight. The workshop will start with goal setting and then we will have lunch, where you will learn how to cook with Qi. We will move into exercises and there will be some lecture, and discussion time. The workshop will close with a meditation. During the workshop we will discuss a 30 day regimen on how to incororpate specific foods, herbs, Qi Gong exercises, and meditation into your daily life. The goal will be to provide tools for empowerment to take your life into your hands. Allowing you to lose weight, feel good, and love yourself.
item.name: Qi Gong for Weight Loss
